name: Squished!
description:
My submission for Ludum Dare 42! Made in 48 hours

With the theme being 'Running out of Space', there is a wall which constantly moves to the right. It can be both beneficial and dangerous to the player.

Controls:

-WASD to move

-R to restart

-Esc to close the game

-F4 for toggle fullscreen (a bit laggy and clunky though, I don't recommend it)

-… that's it :D

Version 1.1 (8/13/18)

-Fixed a typo in the starting screen (thanks winnie33)

-Made the 2nd level easier (lots of people rage quitting on that level)

-Added the fullscreen

Tip: You cannot wall jump on the same side of a wall. Hope you will enjoy playing my game!
